name: David Ramirez
text: Oh yeah, the stopped blaster shot. That was terrible. It should have flickered out soon after he stopped it. The only way that makes scifi sense the way it's shown is that Ren can create bubbles of stopped time.

source_obj.text: Oh yeah, the stopped blaster shot. That was terrible. It should have flickered out soon after he stopped it. The only way that makes scifi sense the way it's shown is that Ren can create bubbles of stopped time.
